features: Say goodbye to messy and damaged car seats with the SRAMI kick mat - the ultimate solution for busy parents on the go!
Made with tough cross-pattern stitching and double-sided 600D Oxford cloth, this kick mat is built to withstand even the most active little ones and keep your seats looking pristine.

Keep your little ones engrossed and happy during car rides with the seat back protector, which boasts a sizable 13 inch tablet holder that's touch-sensitive and perfect for holding iPads or other tablets with bulky covers. No more fussy kids, just endless entertainment and joy on the go!
With its deep and spacious pocket, you can easily store all your essential items and keep your car organized and clutter-free.
Enjoy complete coverage and protection for your car seats with the SRAMI kick mat - a stylish and practical accessory that will make your life easier and your car rides more enjoyable!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: "SRAMI" is a US registered brand not focusing on product quality only, as well as product value added. SRAMI commit ourselves to offering product that it's worth more than it's cost.

Kick mats protector with pocket We know how you loved your car and want to keep it clean and tidy. SRAMI offers you the both! Your seats are protected from kid's kicks and you can put every kid stuffs to the storage pocket! Touch sensitive window Each kick mats protector comes with a touch screen iPad display holder. We know how impatient your children can get, and now they can watch their favorite shows or play their favorite games while on the go. Extra large tablet holder The ONLY one seat protector with XL tablet holder. It supports iPad Pro 12.9", or any other tablets with a bulky case cover.
Waterproof and Easy to Clean Easy to clean those dirty shoe prints on them, just need a wet cloth to clean it up. Fast and convenient Wash tips: better to use cloth with soapy water to wipe off.

3-Step - Simply installation Step 1: Fasten the top velcro straps and adjust to suitable length.Step 2: Buckle up the middle straps and hide to the seat gap.Step 3: Fasten the bottom straps to the seat bottom.Just 3 steps, simple and fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: love that these are so wellly put together and have held up awesome! they keep the seats clean and hold a ton! although i do think the pocket is low for smaller children they do make it so they can access the top easily. over all make it ton easier for having children in the back seat and keeping things in car

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Serves one purpose
reviews.reviewText: I like that it covers the entire front seat. It does not lay flat against the seat and the hooks for the bottom are hard to place. The Velcro strap around the head rest does not fit properly. The only good part is I do not have to continuously clean the back of the front seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional tablet holder and kickmat
reviews.reviewText: I really find this useful! I already had a kick mat, but it didnt have anything on it. This has several functional pockets and most importantly a tablet holder. The material is not the best (my previous kickmat is thicker and better quality), but it serves its purpose and what I expected for the price. Also, the free tissue holder isn't a size that is for the U.S. I think... but it was free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for kids, and the large pocket is already ripped wide open on the side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I didn't understand how the bottom straps connect, but other than that it is more durable than the old ones that I had. They are very handy in holding drinks, papers, etc. They haven't fallen apart yet, when we have put heavy things such as our devices in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I installed both in 15 seconds. Simple as can be. They haven’t gotten dog eared and have stayed put. Kids have been kicking the seats and I don’t mind at all with these to protect them! Definitely recommend these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality Organizers
reviews.reviewText: These were well made and offer lots of extra storage space. I was excited to use them. However, the biggest reason for the purchase was for portable DVD players. The main pocket is clear but once we put the player inside, it sagged so the screen wasn’t facing forward. It was also lower than expected.Although it didn’t work for us, I still think it’s a good option for young kids and tablets- as long as they’re not too heavy. (We ended up returning them)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not so easy to install
reviews.reviewText: I had high hopes for these but was quickly disappointed. They are definitely not “one size fits all”. We have a 2021 Ford Explorer and it’s virtually impossible to install these correctly. The top strap that goes around the headrest is only Velcro so not very sturdy. The middle strap that is suppose to go round the seat and be tucked neatly in the the crease of the seat and the back rest, is too high up and won’t go that low, besides the fact that the strap isn’t long enough to reach. There’s two hooks on the bottom to attach but there’s no where in my vehicle to hook them. I don’t know what vehicle these were made for but it definitely wasn’t a Ford Explorer.
